translation.en: [Po] Once again, hear tell of Po,
[Po] Revered in all of China for his bodacious skills.
translation.de: In ganz China für seine Brillanz verehrt.

translation.en: So self-confident he uses words like "bodacious"
translation.de: So selbstbewusst, dass er das Wort "Brillanz" benutzt,

translation.en: long after they've gone out of fashion.
[Po] He has defeated the most dangerous and cunning enemies of China.
translation.de: Er besiegte die gefährlichsten Feinde Chinas.

translation.en: He has risen to great levels of achievement and fame.
translation.de: Er erklomm den Gipfel des Ruhms.

translation.en: He even has his own Happy Lunch toy,
and is loved by the Emperor himself.
translation.de: und wird vom Kaiser selbst geliebt.

translation.en: And on top of all that,
he has won Employee of the Month at his dad's noodle shop
translation.de: Mitarbeiter des Jahres im Lokal seines Vaters,

translation.en: -Oh, no. Except that one time-- -But it wasn't his fault.
translation.de: -Nur einmal nicht. -Das war nicht seine Schuld.

translation.en: [Po] And now, with the land at peace,
and inactivity making him slightly flabby and easily winded,
translation.de: und ihn die Untätigkeit fett und träge macht,

translation.en: he has accepted the challenge of a lifelong dream.

translation.de: Oh, du hast es wirklich verdient, Po.

translation.en: Now, go out there, enjoy your fans, and realize that the best food in China…
translation.de: Jetzt mach dich auf und finde heraus, dass es das beste Essen in China…

translation.en: Pei-Pei's House of Fat Gobs in Wankun village,
translation.de: Pei-Peis Haus der Fettknödel in Wankun,

translation.en: home of the WuGao Gauntlet. [laughs] [Po] That thing's insanely powerful.
I can't wait to check it out.
Ah, I can smell those fat gobs already.
translation.de: Ich kann die Fettknödel schon riechen.

translation.en: [gasps] Oh! But first, Pei-Pei's House of Fat Gobs. [chuckles]
translation.de: Aber erst zu Pei-Peis Haus der Fettknödel.

translation.en: It's me. Love you, too. Gotta keep moving.
translation.de: Ich bin's, aber ich muss weiter.

translation.en: No kissing. Nice to see you.
-I named my child after you. -[Po] I wish I could stay.
-Let me get closer. -I gotta keep it moving.
-Hey, hey, hey, okay. Watch the fur! -[gasps]
-Me, me, me! -[Po] Y'all have no boundaries.
Okay, no touchy. I love you, bye. Whoa! [yells]
translation.de: Nicht anfassen. Ich hab euch lieb!

translation.en: -[Po] I know. -I fear for the safety of my restaurant.
Please? So hungry. Do you have a private dining room?
translation.de: Bitte. Ich habe Hunger. Gibt es ein Privatzimmer?

translation.en: -[grunts] You can eat in here. -No, I don't think I wanna-- Whoa!
Hm. I'll fetch you a fat gob.
Alright, I know, I know. I'm hungry too.
translation.de: Ja, ich weiß. Ich bin auch hungrig.

translation.en: -Stop them! Somebody stop them. -Not the gauntlet!
[sighs] And even though everyone's always asking, "Where's the Dragon Master?"
no one asks, "How's the Dragon Master?"
Huh. I never thought of it that way. That's what I like about you, Radish.
translation.de: So habe ich das noch nie gesehen. Das mag ich so an dir. Du verstehst mich.
Das mag ich so an dir. Du verstehst mich.

translation.en: Uh, hello? Hello, Pei-Pei? Pei-Pei, you out there? Uh…
translation.de: Äh, hallo, Pei Pei? Pei Pei, bist du da? Äh…

translation.en: [Po chuckles] The door seems to be stuck. I gotta get out there and save the day.
translation.de: Die Tür klemmt. Ich muss raus und helfen.

translation.en: -I get it. It'll be ready soon. -[Po] I'll kick it open.
-[guard] No one can beat our defenses. -[panting]
Give up now. You're not getting the gauntlet.
I will take 'em all down, I will! [grunts]
I'll cook 'em up on a spit till they spitter sputter spit!
translation.de: Ich brate sie am Spieß, bis es spritzt!

translation.en: -He's got the gauntlet. -[villager 4 gasps] Oh no!
translation.de: Er hat den Handschuh. Oh nein!

translation.en: Pity there's no time for that, you little weasels.
translation.de: Schade, dass wir keine Zeit haben, ihr Wiesel.

translation.en: -Nice work, Pandy. -Hey! Whoa. Give me that.
-[Po] What? You gotta be kidding me. -[mystical music plays]
translation.de: Was? Das soll wohl ein Witz sein.

translation.en: [gasps] There's one more of 'em. I got this.
translation.de: Da ist noch einer. Die kriege ich.

translation.en: Seriously, stop, you guys. I'm, like… [wheezes]
translation.de: Im Ernst, haltet an, Leute. Ich bin…

translation.en: Oh, your buddies leaving without you, huh?
translation.de: Hauen deine Kumpel ohne dich ab?

translation.en: -[laughs] Gotcha! -What? How did he catch up?
Surrender the gauntlet, panda, before I set Veruca loose on you.
translation.de: Her mit dem Handschuh, oder ich lasse Veruca auf dich los.

translation.en: I'll tear him into little pieces. Little tweety birds.
translation.de: Ich werde ihn in Stücke reißen.

translation.en: Let us give you a hand. [slurps]
Hey. Let the Dragon Master give you a hand with that.
translation.de: Hey. Der Drachenmeister kann dir helfen.

translation.en: Hey, I can, I can help you with that.
We don't need any more of your help.
I'm the Dragon Master. I was just trying to--
And the WuGao Gauntlet is gone.
-Maybe you want to-- -Have a little snack? Yeah, good idea.
Okay. Well, I guess I'll just, uh…
translation.de: Ja, gut. Ich werde einfach, äh…

translation.en: Quick, come on in. My poor boy.
translation.de: Schnell, komm rein. Mein armer Junge.

translation.en: Yeah, and a bowl of noodles.
Oh, things are crazy. The news, the news!
translation.de: Es ist so verrückt. Die Nachrichten!

translation.en: That I accidentally, not my fault, destroyed a village,
and lost an all-powerful sacred and historical object, not my fault,
translation.de: und ein allmächtiges Objekt verloren habe,

translation.en: that three bad guys got away with, kinda-my-fault-but-a-little-not-my-fault?
Uh-huh. And I'm afraid the Emperor…
The Emperor has taken away your title of Dragon Master.
the dumpling shop returned this box of Dragon Master Happy Lunch toys.
translation.de: Der Laden hat die Dragon-Master-Figuren zurückgeschickt.

translation.en: That's one of the bandits that stole the WuGao Gauntlet.
Why are they coming here? What do I do? I gotta do something!
translation.de: Warum kommen sie her? Ich muss etwas tun!

translation.en: You got a lot of nerve and whatnot, coming here.
-[metallic clanging] -[Po] Whoa. That's a lot of whatnot.
You stay away from my Po.
Don't kill me. I haven't written a will or anything,
translation.de: Tu's nicht. Ich habe kein Testament.

translation.en: and I'd hate to have my action figure collection go to the wrong person. [whimpers]
translation.de: Sonst erbt der Falsche meine Action-Figuren.

translation.en: I'm not here to kill you.
Yeah, I mean, that's what I…
I'm looking for the Dragon Master. I was told he lives in that house.
translation.de: Ich suche den Drachenmeister. Er soll hier wohnen.

translation.en: Yeah, not sure the Dragon Master still exists,
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, ob es ihn noch gibt.

translation.en: but, uh, a couple of days ago, that would be me.
translation.de: Vor ein paar Tagen war ich das noch.

translation.en: [sighs] The very idiot that leveled that village.
I was just there to eat Pei-Pei's fat gobs.
translation.de: Ich wollte nur bei Pei-Pei essen.

translation.en: And you let Klaus and Veruca get away with the gauntlet.
translation.de: Und lässt Klaus und Veruca entkommen.

translation.en: So I've heard. I thought you'd be all happy your friends got away.
translation.de: Freust du dich nicht für deine Freunde?

translation.en: I'm chasing them. I'm trying to stop them.
My name is Luthera of Landreth, the Wandering Blade,
translation.de: Ich bin Luthera von Landreth, die Wandernde Klinge,

translation.en: Daughter of the Saxon Guard, Knight of England.
translation.de: Tochter der Sächsischen Wache, Ritter von England.

translation.en: That's about all I got right now. Title pending, so…
translation.de: Mehr Titel habe ich im Moment nicht.

translation.en: By order of the Queen, I am in pursuit of Klaus and Veruca DuMont.
translation.de: Ich verfolge Klaus und Veruca Dumont.

translation.en: They escaped London, and are in China to locate the very weapon you let them take.
translation.de: Sie kamen wegen der Waffe aus London, die sie nun deinetwegen haben.

translation.en: It could lead to a devastating result for England, China, and the world.
translation.de: Das bringt England, China und die Welt in Gefahr.

translation.en: Whoa, this sounds insanely cool. I'm in.
translation.de: Das klingt wahnsinnig cool. Ich bin dabei.

translation.en: In this, with you. I'll come with you.
I'd rather slice your guts out,
translation.de: Ich reiße dir lieber den Darm raus

translation.en: use them to string a violin, and play it at your funeral.
translation.de: und bespanne damit eine Geige für deine Beerdigung.

translation.en: You got insult game, I'll give you that, leather-shoulder-pad girl.
translation.de: Du kannst echt gut beleidigen, Leder-Schulter-Polster-Mädel.

translation.en: Knight. But seriously, I'd be awesome help.
translation.de: Aber ich wäre dir eine große Hilfe.

translation.en: helping a knight from England track down and capture super bad guys?
And returning the gauntlet would be a perfect way for me to save face, earn trust, and regain my title.
translation.de: Wenn ich den Handschuh finde, erhalte ich meinen Titel zurück.

translation.en: Uh, yeah, uh, help England. Whatever that is.
I'll admit, I haven't made it to a foreign land yet. Just between us, I get a little seasick.
translation.de: Ich war noch nie im Ausland. Ich werde leicht seekrank.

translation.en: Once, I threw up just looking at a cork in a birdbath. True story. So, yeah?
translation.de: Mir wird schon übel, wenn ich Korken auf Wasser sehe.

translation.en: I can help you. I'm the last person who saw Kevin and Valerie.
translation.de: Ich habe Kevin und Valerie zuletzt gesehen.

translation.en: I know which way they headed and how to get there. And I have this.
translation.de: Ich weiß, wohin sie wollen. Und ich habe das hier.

translation.en: Me got something you wants. Me got. You want.
translation.de: Ich habe was, was du willst.

translation.en: I'll just be keeping this in a safe place.
That safe place being my thumb.
Look, I left 'em at the Kai Yu River Pass. Take me, and I'll show you.
translation.de: Sie waren am Kai-Yu-Fluss. Ich bringe dich hin.

translation.en: I'd rather chop off your furry feet and use them as earmuffs
translation.de: Ich benutze lieber deine Pelzfüße als Ohrenschützer

translation.en: while I sink you into a frozen lake.
These are all so complicated and, uh, violent.
translation.de: Deine Beleidigungen sind so kompliziert und brutal.

translation.en: Okay, Wandering Blade. Keep on wandering.
'Cause that's what you'll be doing. China's a pretty big place. [laughs]
translation.de: Aber China ist ein ziemlich großes Land.

translation.en: I'll make camp by the elm tree. I leave in the morning.
translation.de: Ich übernachte da und breche früh auf.

translation.en: ♪ Going on an adventure Gonna catch me some bad guys ♪
translation.de: Ich schnappe mir ein paar Schurken

translation.en: ♪ Gonna get my title back And earn me some trust ♪
♪ 'Cause I'm sort of still The Dragon Master ♪
Gonna save China and stuff, and restore my reputation.
translation.de: Ich rette China und meinen Ruf.
Nein, nein, nein! Sie ist weg!

translation.en: the Daughter of Wangland, something something, is gone!
translation.de: die Tochter von Wangland und so weiter, ist weg!

translation.en: And I'm gonna go find it.
